name: hexjumper
text: Fun story: I don't think that koa wood is extinct, but it is endangered. So her great-grandfather may not be in that much trouble.

text: Koa is beautiful wood. Her great-grandfather is almost certainly extinct, so also not in that much trouble.

name: epicurus
text:
I love love love the first one because that would EXACTLY how I would describe that experience in my innermost thoughts.

Also I cannot picture someone ever being named Clue Bucket, I have not had that life.

text:
My name is Clue Bucket
I think today might just be my lucky day

text: This comment deserves about as many chubbies as any I've yet seen here.  This is exactly why I love Achewood.

name: poodlelucy
text: it reminds me of a bjork song someone sent me, lyrics as follows: "i miss you, but i haven't met you yet. so special, but it hasn't happened yet. you're gorgeous, but i haven't met you yet. i remember, but it hasn't happened yet."

name: heavymetaljesus

name: anitrophaeron
text: In his defense, Clue Bucket is an okay guy.  Honestly though, I am a male and I have two brothers so I can't imagine what it's like to be responsible for the well being of a girl.  If I ever have a daughter she better turn out either really really ugly or really really gay cause if any little assholes come sniffing around my house someone will end up stabbed.

name: oishii
text: Please don't have children.

text:

name: greenkoolayd
text: seconded.  since God has a sense of humor, hes going to make sure that i have lady-children.  its going to be funny to watch me try to be authoritative and stern in the face of a small girl.  i was the cutest lil dude ever, so my children will be as such.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i forgot to say that ill be an embarrassing/protective dad, much to the chagrin of everyone else involved.
